src:
Mahasiswa Unidayan Dapat 'Uang Kaget' dari Undian Telkom
06 Nov 2019, 20:10 by Haerul Mulku Wataullah



Mahasiswa Unidayan Dapat 'Uang Kaget' dari Undian Telkom



Mahasiswa Unidayan Dapat 'Uang Kaget' dari Undian Telkom


KBRN, Baubau : Faisal Pamungkas Amin, warga kelurahan Kadolokatapi, Kecamatan Wolio, Kota Baubau, Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra) tidak menyangka jika dirinya terpilih menjadi pemenang undian semarak kebahagiaan dari Telkom Indonesia dan berhak membawa pulang uang tunai senilai Rp10.000.000. "Saya tidak menyangka. Awalnya saya dapat telepon dari Telkom akan terima hadiah karena langganan, saya tidak percaya tapi saya tunggu saja selama tiga hari, kalo tidak datang berarti penipuan, tapi ternyata datang benaran," bebernya kepada RRI usai menerima hadiah di Kantor Plasa Telkom Baubau, Rabu (6/11/2019).Mahasiswa semester akhir jurusan Teknik Informatika di Universitas Dayanu Iksanudin itu mengaku telah menjadi pelanggan Indihome sejak satu tahun lalu.Sementara itu Kepala Kantor Daerah Telekomunikasi Baubau, Ide Jaenudin mengatakan Faisal mendapat hadiah dari program undian Paket Semarak kebahagiaan yang dibuka sejak bulan Ramadhan lalu. Program undian ini dimaksudkan untuk memacu peningkatan pelanggan baru di tanah air. "Pelanggan Indihome di Baubau merupakan pelanggan yang selalu beruntung. Ini adalah pelanggan ketiga yang terpilih mendapatkan hadiah undian. Sebelumnya ada yang mendapatkan 1 unit motor dan ada yang dapat 1 unit mobil," kata Ide.Dalam kesempatan itu, Ide mengimbau kepada para pelanggan agar menggunakan fasilitas internet secara baik dan bijak."Khusus bagi orang tua agar selalu mengawasi dan mendampingi anak-anaknya saat menggunakan fasilitas internet. Meski secara teknis internet telah di filter namun alangkah baiknya agar selalu di dampingi agar tidak disalah gunakan," harapnya.Di tempat yang sama, Manager Consumer Service Wilayah Sultra Fattah Yusuf Roy berkomitmen akan terus meningkatkan pelayanan terhadap pelanggan di Sultra, termasuk memastikan seluruh kabupaten/kota di Sultra dapat mendapatkan fasilitas internet dari indihome."Kita masih punya PR untuk lima kabupaten di Sultra yang belum sama sekali teraliliri kabel fiber optik yakni Kabupaten Buton Utara, Konawe Utara, Buton Tengah, Konawe Kepulauan, dan Muna Barat," jelas Roy.Roy menyebut pekerjaan infrastruktur pendukung masuknya kabel fiber optik di lima daerah di Sultra itu ditarget pada tahun 2020 mendatang melalui jaringan palapa ring tengah.Khusus di Kota Baubau masih tersisa dua kecamatan yang lagi yang belum terjangkau kabel fiber optik indihome yakni Sorawolio dan Lea-Lea. Sorawolio akan diupayakan pengerjaannya pada akhir tahun ini, sementra Lea-lea akan menyusul kemudianbersamaan dengan Kelurahan Lowu-lowu, Kalia-lia dan Pulau Makasar.
text:
Unidayan Students Get 'Shocked Money' from Telkom Lottery
Nov 6, 2019, 20:10 by Haerul Mulku Wataullah



Unidayan Students Get 'Shocked Money' from Telkom Lottery



Unidayan Students Get 'Shocked Money' from Telkom Lottery


KBRN, Baubau: Faisal Pamungkas Amin, a resident of the village of Kadolokatapi, Wolio Subdistrict, Baubau City, Southeast Sulawesi (Sultra), did not think that he would be chosen as the winner of a lively lottery from Telkom Indonesia and had the right to bring home Rp10,000,000 cash. "I did not expect. Initially I was able to call from Telkom to receive a gift because of a subscription, I did not believe it, but I just waited for three days, if it did not mean fraud, but it turned out to be true," he told RRI after receiving a gift at the Telkom Plaza Office Baubau, Wednesday (11/6/2019). The final semester student majoring in Informatics Engineering at Dayanu University Iksanudin claimed to have been an Indihome customer since one year ago. Meanwhile, Head of the Baubau Telecommunications Regional Office, Ide Jaenudin said Faisal got a prize from the Lottery Package program. Lively happiness that opened since last Ramadan. This lottery program is intended to spur an increase in new customers in the country. "Indihome customers in Baubau are always lucky customers. This is the third customer chosen to get the prize draw. Previously there was one motorbike unit and one got a car," Ide said. On the occasion, Ide advised the customers to use internet facilities properly and wisely. "Especially for parents to always supervise and accompany their children when using internet facilities. Although technically the internet has been filtered but it is better to always be accompanied so as not to be misused," he hoped. the same, Southeast Sulawesi Regional Consumer Service Manager Fattah Yusuf Roy is committed to continue to improve services to customers in Southeast Sulawesi, including ensuring all regencies / cities in Southeast Sulawesi can get internet facilities from indihome. "We still have homework for five districts in Southeast Sulawesi that have not been at all teraliliri fiber optic cable namely North Buton Regency, North Konawe, Buton T panting, Konawe Kepulauan, and Muna Barat, "explained Roy. Roy said the infrastructure work supporting the entry of fiber optic cables in five regions in Southeast Sulawesi was targeted in 2020 through the middle palapa ring network. Particularly in the City of Baubau there are still two more sub-districts which again indihome fiber optic cable has not yet been reached namely Sorawolio and Lea-Lea. Sorawolio will be endeavored at the end of this year, while Lea-lea will follow later in conjunction with Lowu-lowu, Kalia-lia and Makasar Island villages.
